featured.text: An eye stye is a small bump, resembling a pimple, that develops when an oil gland at the edge of an eyelid becomes infected by bacteria.
You might speed up healing time by gently pressing a warm washcloth 20 your eyelid for 10 minutes, 3 or 4 times a day.

definition.zh_def: 眼瞼是覆蓋在眼睛前面的皮膚摺疊，主要功能是保護眼睛和調節光線進入。
definition.en_def: The eyelid is a fold of skin that covers and protects the eye, helping to regulate the amount of light that enters.
definition.example: She blinked her eyelids to keep her eyes moist.
